skills.title: React & Next.js
skills.description: React has been my frontend evolution, starting from Node.js and maturing through React 18, React Native 0.74, Next.js 13/14, and Expo. I follow SOLID principles, build reusable component architectures, and manage state with React Query, TanStack Table, React Hook Form, and Context API. I deliver pixel-perfect Figma-to-code implementations with consistent typography, spacing, and theming.
skills.description_short: Frontend expert with React 18, Next.js, React Native, and Expo. Building scalable, performant applications with clean component architectures.

usages.detail: Leading migration of internal packages in a monorepo using React 18, React Native 0.74, Next.js 13/14, and Expo. Built cross-platform features with TanStack React Query, TanStack Table, React Hook Form. Implemented enterprise-grade design systems with DatoCMS integration and OAuth 2.0 providers.

Developed high-performance React applications for a no-code platform. Designed reusable component architectures and implemented charting libraries (Chart.js, D3.js) for admin dashboards. Migrated codebases to TypeScript and developed reusable npm packages.

Built full-stack Next.js app with user auth and /dashboard landing. Implemented Jobs workflow: list view, detail view, multi-step accordion for Base CV upload and Job Description. Integrated OpenAI for auto-generating tailored CVs and Cover Letters with downloadable PDFs.

Introduced React as core frontend technology, replacing legacy Zend views. Built scalable component architecture with React Router for client-side navigation. Managed complex state with Context API and custom hooks. Applied code-splitting and lazy loading for performance optimization.

skills.title: TypeScript
skills.description: TypeScript 5+ is my standard for all frontend and backend work. I enforce type safety across monorepos, migrate legacy JavaScript codebases, and build typed interfaces for REST APIs, GraphQL schemas, and component libraries. Strong typing has been essential in maintaining quality across large-scale applications.
skills.description_short: TypeScript 5+ standard for type-safe development. REST APIs, GraphQL, component libraries. Modernizing legacy JavaScript codebases.

usages.detail: Using TypeScript 5+ across React 18, React Native, and Next.js applications. Enforced type safety in monorepo structure, built typed interfaces for GraphQL APIs, OAuth integrations, and blockchain (ERC-20/721) wallet interactions.

Migrated large Angular and React codebases from JavaScript to TypeScript. Built strongly-typed npm packages and established TypeScript standards across the team. Created typed interfaces for REST APIs and database schemas with Prisma.
Introduced TypeScript to Magento II project, building typed interfaces for REST APIs and custom modules. Improved developer experience with IDE autocompletion and compile-time error checking.

usages.detail: Built backend services in Laravel for a no-code platform. Designed REST APIs for complex workflows, integrated third-party services, and managed database operations with optimization and caching strategies.

Maintained and enhanced Magento 1 and 2 e-commerce applications. Designed custom modules, REST APIs, and conducted performance audits. Identified bottlenecks in third-party integrations and delivered improvement plans.

Redesigned Magento 1 architecture to support promotional behavior. Developed backend system for promotional item management and cross-sell relationships. Built tools for structural issue identification and image asset optimization.
Led migration of legacy backend to Zend Framework 1. Refactored 200+ templates with REGEX patterns, improving consistency and maintainability. Mentored frontend team via pair programming.

Developed core backend for e-procurement platform using PHP and YII framework. Refactored Customer Support system with pattern-based architecture. Built custom JavaScript runtime importer for dynamic library loading.

My Sperm Whale project demonstrates real-time transcription and translation using Whisper and multi-engine AI.

Implemented asset management and caching inspired by game-engine rendering loops for performance optimization.

Developed Python backend services for critical tasks. Created backup and reporting systems, AWS server-side scripting, and diagnostic tools. Evolved BashAliases fork with AI-powered diagnostics for Linux server maintenance.

Evolved from simple Linux aliases into a complete system setup framework. Engineered advanced shell scripting utilities using Bash and Python with OOP design principles. Integrated OpenAI API for intelligent, context-aware scripting directly from the terminal.

My .bash_aliases project evolved into a cross-platform toolkit integrating Python and OpenAI for intelligent scripting.

Developed Bash scripts for AWS server-side scripting, CI/CD pipelines, and rollback procedures. Created specialized fork of bash_aliases with AI-powered diagnostics for Linux environment maintenance and rapid troubleshooting.

Active in GNU/Linux community since 2005. Organized events and promoted free software through GLUGPB & CETI groups. Advocated for Linux best practices and open-source culture across the Northeast Brazil developer community.
